sec.title: Ethics approval and consent to participate
sec.p: Human blood sampling was performed in the blood bank of the Regional Blood Transfusion Centre of Gafsa, Gafsa, Tunisia (ISSN.0330.7921). All of the blood donors were medically examined and were declared healthy.

sec.title: Consent for publication
sec.p: All authors read and approved the final content of this manuscript for publication.

sec.title: Competing interests
sec.p: The authors declare that they have no competing interests.
